meanings.definition: To be fascinated or enchanted by something.
meanings.sent1: The children were beglamored by the magician's tricks.
meanings.sent2: She was beglamored by the beauty of the starry night sky.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was beglamored by its own reflection in the mirror.
meanings.sent4: The young girl's eyes were beglamored by the sparkling lights of the city.
meanings.sent5: The audience was beglamored by the graceful movements of the ballet dancers.

meanings.definition: To be adorned or decorated with glamour.
meanings.sent1: The ballroom was beglamored with twinkling fairy lights.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was beglamored with sequins and glitter.
meanings.sent3: The cake was beglamored with edible gold leaf and pearls.
meanings.sent4: The stage was beglamored with elaborate set decorations.
meanings.sent5: The garden was beglamored with colorful flowers and sparkling ornaments.
